trans-unit.source:
Reliable and scalable email delivery platform with SMTP and API. Real-time monitoring service for all your email traffic. Responsive email design with MJML and Passport.
https://www.mailjet.com

Template ID is an identifier for a template that is previously created and stored in Mailjet's system. Visit the Use a Template section for more information.
[dev.mailjet.com/guides](https://dev.mailjet.com/guides/index.html#use-a-template)
The template ID can also be configured globally via `Settings.yaml`.

The username is your API Key - you can find it in your API Key Management page. The key is generated automatically when your account is created.
[dev.mailjet.com/guides](https://dev.mailjet.com/guides/#authentication)
The username can also be configured globally via `Settings.yaml`.

The password is your API Secret Key - you can find it in your API Key Management page. The key is generated automatically when your account is created.
[dev.mailjet.com/guides](https://dev.mailjet.com/guides/#authentication)
The password can also be configured globally via `Settings.yaml`.

This property sets a special header `X-MJ-TemplateErrorReporting` on the api request. It defines the email address, to which a carbon copy with the error message is sent.
An error message is created, when something went wrong while compiling the email template.
[dev.mailjet.com/guides](https://dev.mailjet.com/guides/index.html#x-mj-templateerrorreporting)
